snippet: Indonesia has agreed to pay $1.8 million to prevent one of its citizens from being executed in Saudi Arabia, just days before she was to be beheaded for killing her employer.
abstract: Indonesia has agreed to pay $1.8 million to prevent Satinah Binti Jumadi Ahmad, one of its citizens, from being executed in Saudi Arabia, just days before she was to be beheaded for killing her employer.
lead_paragraph: Indonesia has agreed to pay $1.8 million to prevent one of its citizens from being executed in Saudi Arabia, just days before she was to be beheaded for killing her employer.

headline.main: Indonesia: Payment Spares Maid in Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: Payment Spares Maid in Saudi Arabia
